text: (Anabi) Musa so pe: "Oluwa wa, dajudaju Iwo l’O fun Fir‘aon ati awon ijoye re ni oso ati dukia ninu isemi aye. Oluwa wa, (O fun won) nitori ki won le seri awon eniyan kuro loju ona (esin) Re. Oluwa wa, pa dukia won re, ki O si mu okan won le, ki won ma gbagbo mo titi won fi maa ri iya eleta-elero
